title: How to Remove Makeup with Makeup Wipes | AVEENO®
description:
Makeup remover wipes are an easy and effective way to get rid of the heaviest of makeup, while also being a gentle face cleanser. Removing your makeup is important in preventing breakouts and unclogging pores.  AVEENO ULTRA-CALMING® MAKEUP REMOVING WIPES, with feverfew, can remove all types of makeup, and is gentle for even the most sensitive skin care routines.

Reduce the appearance of dry skin, redness and blotchiness with AVEENO ULTRA-CALMING® MAKEUP REMOVING WIPES

Reduce the appearance of dry skin, redness and blotchiness with AVEENO ULTRA-CALMING® MAKEUP REMOVING WIPES: http://www.aveeno.com/product/aveeno+ultra-calming-+makeup+removing+wipes+.do?sortby=ourPicks&from=fn

asset.author: aveeno

transcripts: Removing your makeup is important in preventing breakouts, and opening your pores. Aveeno ultra-calming makeup removing wipes with feverfew makes short work of even the heaviest makeup while helping sooth even the most sensitive skin. Watch how easy it is. Step 1: Tie your hair back so you can see your face. Step 2: Arm yourself, grab one Aveeno ultra-calming makeup removing wipe, don’t forget to close the lid so the other ones don’t dry out. Step 3: eye makeup especially mascara is generally the most difficult to remove. Which is why it’s the best place to start, close your eyes and gently wipe once or twice to lift eye makeup with ease. Step 4: Once you’re done with your eyes flip the wipe over and use the fresh side to cleans the rest of your face. You’re done, this method gently removes makeup, dirt, and oil from even the most sensitive skin. Improve the appearance of dry skin, redness, and blotchiness, with Aveeno ultra-calming makeup removing wipes.
